TopicTitle: {AMRSD} A new contender approaches... THE AMRSD TANK! "It's built like a tank"

Articles.Content:
I realized it had been too long since a release, so I decided to release this tank:

![stdg0eB.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/stdg0eB.png?1)

I know how it is. You see zekes' T-34 1940 tank, and you start to drool. You take it out on a test flight, and you use whack-a-kerbal to break the runway, for some off-road testing. Then you're not driving it for 3 seconds, and all the wheels are broken, and it's flipped over.

![SdcQhhu.png](http://i.imgur.com/SdcQhhu.png)

So you think: maybe it's great in battle!

![WoDpJjh.png](http://i.imgur.com/WoDpJjh.png)

But...

![CWpt9Ab.png](http://i.imgur.com/CWpt9Ab.png)

![KackVVY.png](http://i.imgur.com/KackVVY.png)

Have you ever wanted to do this with a tank?

![N51r6gP.png](http://i.imgur.com/N51r6gP.png)

...And have it survive?

![y0eRGBW.png](http://i.imgur.com/y0eRGBW.png)

This uses a "poke" cannon, just drive into what you want to destroy, and...

![B4yYCEr.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/B4yYCEr.png?1)

The part count isn't prohibitively high, either: about 300 parts.

Uses a suspension system capable of navigating even the toughest terrain:

![sRe1dfQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/sRe1dfQ.png)

(This is from a earlier version)

Enjoy!

[Download](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/AMRSD-Tough-tank)

Amazing Poke weapon xD

10/10 KGN would poke again

> 
> Amazing Poke weapon xD
> 10/10 KGN would poke again

Thanks! I'm always happy to get feedback, and I think I forgot to mention: It can destroy the VAB.
